DOC.detailed_description: The study open-label , unmasked , uncontrolled phase I II trial evaluate safety efficacy two injection autologous mesenchymal stem cell ( MSC ) Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis ( ALS ) patient . Patients recruit trough web-based registration system , open ALS Brazilian patient . The patient enrol in-person screening University Sao Paulo Medical School Clinics Hospital inclusion criterion fulfil . There 9 national call registration , two month apart . The enrolled patient follow 3 month bone marrow aspiration ( BMA ) . Patients receive 2 intrathecal MSC injection , 1 2 month BMA . The patient follow 6 month intervention .
